tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage

definition.text: After you delete the open, close, and manage stages, you are ready to run a new backtest with the same parameters used earlier.

paragraphs.text: Let's do it! Run the task and session!

When you run multiple backtests on the same time frame, the earlier data is replaced. That is, a trading session stores one data set for each time frame. If you want to keep—and be able to access—different versions of the tests you should use different trading sessions, and even better, different trading systems so that you may keep the matching definitions as well!
